info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 7 at 10:50AM EDT until May 9 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Northern Indiana
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Ohio...
Blanchard River at Ottawa affecting Putnam County.
For the Blanchard River...including Ottawa...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Blanchard River at Ottawa.
* WHEN...From this evening to Thursday night.
* IMPACTS...At 23.0 feet, Lowland flooding occurs mainly in south Ottawa. Flood water also gets into low farmlands.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM EDT Wednesday the stage was 22.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening to a crest of 23.3 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 23.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
Detailed river forecasts and additional information can be found at www.weather.gov/iwx under Rivers and Lakes.
The next statement will be issued late tonight at 1230 AM EDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO THURSDAY NIGHT
